text:
Hey guys, have you'll ever encountered this situation:

You have built a custom module for emails. In this module you're using personalization tokens and it works everywhere but it doesn't work for a CTA.

I've tried hard searching about this issue, couldn't find any solution. :disappointed:
Thanks <@UTPA0DS59> Seems like a silly thing to overlook in the CMS. I"ll put in a feature request for this one...
